description: Obtains information about the conditional forwarders for this account. If no input parameters are provided for RemoteDomainNames, this request describes all conditional forwarders for the specified directory ID.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The directory ID for which to get the list of associated conditional forwarders.

parameters.name: RemoteDomainNames
parameters.description: The fully qualified domain names (FQDN) of the remote domains for which to get the list of associated conditional forwarders. If this member is null, all conditional forwarders are returned. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ConditionalForwarders
nested_items.description: The list of conditional forwarders that have been created.

nested_items.name: RemoteDomainName
nested_items.description: The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the remote domains pointed to by the conditional forwarder.

nested_items.name: DnsIpAddrs
nested_items.description: The IP addresses of the remote DNS server associated with RemoteDomainName. This is the IP address of the DNS server that your conditional forwarder points to.

nested_items.name: ReplicationScope
nested_items.description: The replication scope of the conditional forwarder. The only allowed value is Domain, which will replicate the conditional forwarder to all of the domain controllers for your Amazon Web Services directory.
